snippet: Federal prosecutors announced a deal on Monday to drop a criminal case against the Gibson Guitar Corporation after it acknowledged that its importing of exotic wood violated environmental laws.
lead_paragraph: Federal prosecutors announced a deal on Monday to drop a criminal case against the Gibson Guitar Corporation after it acknowledged that its importing of exotic wood violated environmental laws.

headline.seo: Deal With Gibson Guitar Corporation Ends Case on Illegal Import of Wood
headline.main: Tennessee: Deal With Guitar Maker Ends Case on Illegal Import of Wood
headline.print_headline: Tennessee: Deal With Guitar Maker Ends Case On Illegal Import of Wood
